Text: O me̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa, todu i chenyo̩;
Abo unyi Aro̩n ki ka kakini,
Abo ku ma railo Jihofa kika kakini,
Jihofa chʼe̩ne̩-mi i dʼef abo ku ma te̩ko mi;
Ma donyʼumi, ochochi, ma donyʼumi daka;
Uwe̩ fʼe̩wñ ro̩, ro̩, ño̩ ro̩ ñw mi bie̩ne̩ todu kʼu wane̩,
Omi aku n, chai edeju nadeju,
Jihofa ko̩ mi o̩la ki wo̩ mi,
Nagogbo̩dʼuwe̩ todu kʼe̩ mʼohi du ñw mi me̩
Fʼujadu che fa-i ke, a gbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩, O Jihofa!
Ekele ma kele e̩ne̩ kʼi awa ef odu Jihofa!
O me̩ gogbodo̩ Jihofa, todu i chenyo̩;
